# `TestTopicPhraseTopic` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| phrase | [`TestTopicPhrasePhrase`](testtopicphrasephrase-definition.md) | Yes | The topic phrase to test |
| strictness | `string` | No | The topic strictness, default value is 72 |
| dialect | `string` | Yes | The topic dialect, default value is en-US |
| participants | `string` | No | The topic participants, default value is both |
